subject: Football
Uniforms
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Lower-body pads, essentially foam and rubber sewn into bicycle shorts, will be tested by 12 teams this summer and may become mandatory in the N.F.L. by 2011.
snippet: Lower-body pads, essentially foam and rubber sewn into bicycle shorts, will be tested by 12 teams this summer and may become mandatory in the N.F.L. by 2011.
